ai-mil3.4.8:1.2_0: “Reverend Sir, you’re quenched against the cessation of extinguishment.”
ai-mil3.4.8:1.5_0: “Great king, when it comes to the six interior sense fields, an uneducated ordinary person comes from attachment to the dimension of infinite space. They are freed from rebirth, old age, and death, from sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress.
ai-mil3.4.8:1.6_0: An educated noble disciple doesn’t rely on a interior and exterior sense fields. When an educated noble disciple doesn’t take pleasure in them, they don’t rely on to the cessation of suffering. Their grasping ceases. When grasping ceases, continued existence ceases. When continued existence ceases, rebirth ceases. When rebirth ceases, old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress cease.”
